DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety profile / factors which impact safety and efficacy of Nexium capsules in daily clinical usage for the patients who have been prescribed Nexium for "gastric ulcer", "duodenal ulcer", "anastomotic ulcer", "reflux oesophagitis", "non-erosive reflux disease", or "Zollinger-Ellison syndrome"
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with Nexium for the first time due to gastric ulcer, duodenal ulcer, anastomotic ulcer, reflux oesophagitis, nonerosive reflux disease, ZollingerEllison syndrome. None
DOC.keyword: gastric ulcer, duodenal ulcer, anastomotic ulcer, reflux oesophagitis, non-erosive reflux disease, Zollinger-Ellison syndrome, Nexium
